DOC.brief_title: An Open Label , Multi-Center , Follow-on Study Examining Long-Term Safety Efficacy Insulin VIAject™ Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: 1 . Completed VIAject™06J protocol 2 . Informed consent must obtain write subject 1 . History frequent severe hypoglycemia within prior six month prevent study participation discretion investigator 2 . History known hypersensitivity component study medication 3 . Progressive disease likely prove fatal 4 . Known significant hepatic disease serum AST ALT value > 3 X upper limit normal bilirubin level > 1.5 X upper limit normal 5 . Severe complication diabetes mellitus include history finding Stage III IV diabetic retinopathy ( see Appendix B ) , proteinuria > 2+ urine dipstick , serum creatinine > 1.8 mg/dl male > 1.5 mg/dl female , history renal transplant , severe peripheral vascular disease , result amputation recent onset chronic foot ulcer claudication , recent , clinically document loss pedal pulse . 6 . History moderate severe ketoacidosis within 3 month precede screen study 7 . Current drug alcohol abuse , history opinion Investigator impair subject safety protocol compliance . 8 . Current significant cardiovascular , respiratory , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , neurological , psychiatric and/or hematological disease evaluate Investigator 9 .
